definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Can run- of -mill skin contusion use gentian violet?
sentences.chinese: 一般性皮膚挫傷能不能用紫藥水？

sentences.english: Soap General term for the "salt" of a fatty acid.
sentences.chinese: 皁基對脂肪酸鹽的一般性稱呼。

sentences.english: This paper presents a review on Levinson s theory of generalized conversational implicature (GCI).
sentences.chinese: 從三個方面對萊文森的一般性談話隱涵理論進行評介。

sentences.english: The common definition of singular and even function was given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了奇偶函數的一般性定義。

sentences.english: Well, the general equations, now, which deal in gravity...
sentences.chinese: 現在一般性方程引入，到了重力的例子裏。

sentences.english: Read or review the general introductory material at the beginning of the chapter.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀或審查本章一開始的一般性的介紹材料。

sentences.english: Operating Expenses Sales, General and Admin.
sentences.chinese: 營業費用銷售，一般性和管理。

sentences.english: We should not carry out the general transformation with the main targets to fill up vacancies and to enlarge production capacity.
sentences.chinese: 不搞填平補齊和以擴大產量爲主要目的的一般性改造。

sentences.english: But this was reversed when participants were thinking abstractly.
sentences.chinese: 但做一般性思考的參與者情況正好相反。

sentences.english: This chart is intended only as a general guide to alkalizing and acidifying foods.
sentences.chinese: 這個表只是瞭解形成鹼性和酸性食品的一般性指引。

sentences.english: He presents the subject, however, not in its individuality but in its generality.
sentences.chinese: 他通過一般性而非個體性來表現宇宙。

sentences.english: And welcome to the opening of this 65th general debate.
sentences.chinese: 並歡迎出席第六十五屆會議一般性辯論開幕式。

sentences.english: Shall we first sign a barter trade agreement stipulating the general terms and conditions?
sentences.chinese: 我們先簽一個易貨貿易協議，規定一般性條款，行嗎？

sentences.english: Inner-party democracy has general characteristics of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 黨內民主具有民主的一般性特徵。

sentences.english: Output coding is a general framework for solving multiclass problems.
sentences.chinese: 輸出編碼是解決多類別分類問題的一般性框架。

sentences.english: This article is intended as a general introduction to the concepts of IP networks and subnetting.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在對IP網絡和子網的概念進行一般性介紹。

definition: in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
